query: Could you create a 3-day travel itinerary for a group of 8, departing from Valparaiso and moving to Belleville? We will be traveling from March 3rd to March 5th, 2022. Our total budget for this trip is $6,600. We fancy Chinese and American cuisines for our meals during this trip.
